ygData.subject: Re: PGT as a via 1hslash for a lvl 35 Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 35 you should have a weapon that procs, like the Staff of Writhing, I m level 27 and I have a Staff of Writhing. Obsidian Scimitar and a Dirk in my
ygData.messageBody:
At level 35 you should have a weapon that procs, like the Staff of
Writhing, I'm level 27 and I have a Staff of Writhing. Obsidian Scimitar
and a Dirk in my Range weapon slot. These are quite good weapons but I
would ideally like to reaplce the Scimitar with a runed Falchion, or even
better replace them both with dual wielding Ykesha's 8)

Madagan




downboy@... on 09/11/99 22:34:59

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] PGT as a via 1hslash for a lvl 35 Bard?




From: downboy@...

Hi, I was just wondering what people think about using a Polished Granite
Tomahawk for a 1hslash weapon at lvl 35? I have a Silvery war axe,Barbed
whip and Dirk right now also. The PGT has a lower dmg ratio than any
of the above mentioned weapons, but I kind of like the dmg barrier it
provides for a limited time. My main question is whether or not the dmg
barrier and extra strength negate the agility loss when it procs? My agil
is base at 110 base and I have not bought mush agil increasing items.
Thanks for any suggestions, I'd like to hear what people think on the PGT.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
